headline.main: WEYGAND IS IN VICHY FOR CABINET SESSION; War in East Adds to Import of Relations With Reich

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 16 -- General Maxime Weygand, Vichy's pro-consul in Africa, arrived here today by air for Saturday's Cabinet meeting. It is doubtful whether the customary communique will mention French-German relations; but the fact remains that, as bulletins from the Russian front stress German successes, French-German relations take on added importance.
abstract: Gen Weygand arrives, Vichy, for Cabinet meeting; Franco-German relations discussed
